ActDepartment of Human Resources Development Act
Special Appointment Regulations, No. 2003-25
PrecisAppointment of MARYANTONETT FLUMIAN of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Associate Deputy Minister of Human Resources and Skills Development, to hold office during pleasure; and to be concurrently an Associate Deputy Minister of Human Resources Development, to hold office during pleasure, effective December 12, 2003.
